query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN observations IS NOT NULL AND observations != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_observations,
       SUM(CASE WHEN recommendations IS NOT NULL AND recommendations != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_recommendations
FROM assessments LIMIT 1;

       SUM(CASE WHEN recommendations IS NOT NULL AND recommendations != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_recommendations
